attributes.additional_details: This will help reduce infection rates. Stop the fast spread of covid in SEN schools as they need more 1-1 care. Staff and parents are getting very ill with the virus. Teachers union have gavered evidence.
attributes.background: This national lockdown has closed all schools except SEN schools. These children are spreading the virus as much as primary/secondary schools and it is not safe for teaching staff to be in SEN schools. SEN schools should be only offering a space to keyworker and critically vulnerable children.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567579

During the current lockdown the Government has stated that colleges, primary (reception onwards) and secondary schools will remain open for vulnerable children and the children of critical workers only: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-lockdown-stay-at-home#going-to-school-or-college
